case.title: STILL NOT TOO LATE TO ENJOY THE SUMMER 2GETHER - 48 (CT, WSTCH, NJ)
case.text:
LETS HAVE FUN AND ENJOY THE REST OF THIS WEATHER BEFORE IT GETS UGLY
Caucasian Gentleman 40-60 Who are very giving, ambitious, honest and anything but cheap or wimpy. (yes I had to say it) And, please want to talk on the phone ASAP. Take a chance and come forth- what do you have to lose. I am in my 40s and seriously look younger. I am ambitous, go -getter, love most things under the sun. Do not let nothing rain on my parade either. . .A pic def gets mine. Hope to hear from you, you lucky guy!
